meanings.definition: A person who enjoys outdoor activities such as hunting, fishing, and camping.
meanings.sent1: The outdoorsmen set up their tents in the forest for a weekend of camping.
meanings.sent2: Many outdoorsmen love to fish in the peaceful lakes during summer.
meanings.sent3: The outdoorsmen tried to catch a fish but ended up with a boot on their hook instead!
meanings.sent4: Like skilled trackers, the outdoorsmen followed the trail of the elusive deer.
meanings.sent5: The group of outdoorsmen shared stories around the crackling campfire.
